import React from "react" import {NavLink, Link} from "react-router-dom" import PropTypes from "prop-types" const TopNavigation = ({isAuth, logout}) => { return (
Home Films Add new film
{isAuth ? ( Logout ) : ( <> Sign in Sign Up )}
) } TopNavigation.propTypes = { isAuth: PropTypes.bool.isRequired, logout: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default TopNavigation
